name: One Big Chomp
description:
Updates

Turns out the browser version was busted, so I took it down. EXE should function properly (count chomps correctly, provide power-ups).

One Big Chomp!

Rorie is on a Chomping Spree across San Francisco! Help him give lots of lovin' to every dog he meets in the streets!

Left-click to move, space to dash, right to stun (when enabled)

Made for the Giant ROM 4 game jam using GameMaker.

Next Steps

  • Have player re-appear in same location on map between rooms
  • Sound design
  • Implement an effect between room transitions

Credits

  • Camera Tutorial from HeartBeast
  • Finding all instances within a given range
  • UI elements from Kenney.nl
  • Dogs from Time Fantasy
  • Character sprite kit from sheep.art
  • Maps by Stamen Design
  • Golden Duders by SupernormalStep
